instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app . On the top right, tap Layers . Tap the style of map that you want to get. Tap the details that you want to include: Transit : Public transportation information, like train lines and bus routes. Traffic : Flow of traffic on the roads. Note : Traffic information isn't available everywhere. Bicycling: Bicycle paths that you can take. To turn off a view or hide details, tap it again.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app . Start transit directions. Read more about how to get directions . Get on a transit vehicle. You ll get a notification from Google Maps. Note: When you exit the transit vehicle, the notification disappears. Tap the notification. Fill out the questionnaire.

On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google Maps app . Search for transit directions. Read more about how to get directions . Tap a route. If the transit line has crowd size information available, you ll find one of the following: Many empty seats Few empty seats Standing room only Cramped standing room
